summary: This document is an email correspondence from Jeffrey Epstein discussing his inability to meet due to upcoming exams. He mentions a potential visit to New York or an island in the following weekends.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, indicating he has major exams and cannot meet as proposed.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein has major exams coming up and needs to focus on studying.
Epstein mentions a potential visit to New York or an island in the following weekends.
